date.description: The date for which the analytics data is provided.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier of the YouTube channel for which the data is queried.

video_id.description: The unique identifier of the YouTube video for which the data is queried.

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates whether the views are from a live stream or on-demand content.

subscribed_status.description: Specifies whether the viewers are subscribed to the channel or not.

country_code.description: The two-letter country code representing the country location of the viewers.

age_group.description: The age group of the viewers, categorized into different ranges.

gender.description: The gender of the viewers, categorized as male, female, or unknown.

views_percentage.description: The percentage of total views represented by the specific demographic segment.
